name: The Goldminor
description:
Little minor wanna have gold!

Press left, down or right to aim where you wanna dig, space to start digging, and press space again when in the red part of the bar to successfully dig. Unssuccessful dig means you have to try again.

Also, press left or right to move toward an empty space.

There's no possible way of being definitively locked, and all level except the first has at least one little gimick.

The goal is to go downward, as fast as possible.

If you finish the game under 100 seconds, the ending is slightly different!

The game is very old, back when my username was mat1er, I just finally decided it was time to upload it on my itch io, thanks to a friend. So thank you, you, friend.
